headline: Why R&D Spending Is Central to ARRY's Long-Term Profitability
summary: ARRY is doubling down on R&D to sharpen its solar tracker edge, lift energy yield, cut LCOE and fuel long-term margin expansion. Shares are up 95% in six months.
